alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 7:14PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Marion County through 800 PM EST... At 713 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Inverness, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Weirsdale, Santos, The Village of Briar Meadow, Ocklawaha, Moss Bluff, Silver Springs Shores, Ocala Airport, Lake Weir and Belleview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion
